text: Rabi Ray (26 November 1926 â€“ 6 March 2017) was an Indian socialist politician. He was the Speaker of the Lok Sabha from 1989 to 1991. He joined the Socialist Party in 1948, and later became member of the Samyukta Socialist Party, the Janata Party and the Janata Dal. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Speakers of the Lok Sabha Category:Politicians from Odisha
title: Rabi Ray
